long_description: No one likes to leave gear behind. Use the Metolius Torque(TM) nut tool to help you extract cams and nuts from tight places. Curved shape lets you get behind a nut to hook it and pull; tapered nose fits in small cracks. Hooked nose grabs cam trigger bars. Features 4 built-in wrenches for tightening loose bolts; fits all common bolt sizes. Built-in wiregate carabiner lets you clip the Metolius Torque nut tool to your harness. Hardened 420 stainless-steel body stands up to regular encounters with rock. Includes a palm protector on the carabiner-end of the tool.
short_description: No one likes to leave gear behind. Use the Metolius Torque(TM) nut tool to help you extract cams and nuts from tight places.
